quotes.t: For my part, I find increasingly that I miss the simplicity, the almost willful {qword}paucity{/qword}, of the English way of doing things.
This relative {qword}paucity{/qword} of freeloaders and deadbeats means that rookie Americans, as a group, more than pay their way.
If you had one of those Yugoslav names with a {qword}paucity{/qword} of vowels, you might sprinkle in a few …

et: Middle English {it}paucite{/it}, from Latin {it}paucitat-, paucitas{/it}, from {it}paucus{/it} little {ma}{mat|few|}{/ma}
